emuInput.TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Rens basketball players Jim McCoy, Walt Kennedy, and Hank Whitney surrounding Connie Hawkins lying in hospital bed after eye injury, Montefiore Hospital
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 22, 1962, pg. 26, reads: "Checking Up - Teammates of Pittsburgh Rens star Connie Hawkins give him the once-over during a visit to Montefiore Hospital, where Hawkins was recuperating from an eye injury. From left to right: Jim McCoy, Walt Kennedy (making like a hear specialist) and Hank Whitney, trying to find out if Hawkins has a pulse. Apparently the examination came out OK for Hawkins was released from hospital Tuesday. - Harris Photo."
